Serious question though... Does. Anyone. Have. Buffy's. Pager number.
#Trump https://t.co/n2WMhoBe5V
@lada90 It was the "you" that really got me. She was also Irish so she meant "gays". She got a lesson, but this crap every day is draining.
@lada90 Same. Today, an Amnesty fundraiser told me "we're the ones who got you same-sex marriage", like she wanted to be thanked.
@lada90 Obviously this is the first time they've ever had to march against anything. Otherwise, they'd understand why inclusion is no.1
@lada90 That whole "political correctness gone mad" response has been so f*cking upsetting!
Buffy predicted Trump. https://t.co/cYzGpQZKaG
Friends, help me spread the word about @ScienceMarchIE so that we can oppose a culture of 'alternative facts'.… https://t.co/XobxGsY0B1

@ihrobertson Thanks Ian! Hope to see you there :)
@catherinecronin @ScienceMarchIE Thanks so much! There are a few of us now. It will be great to have you there!
Hi. Excuse me while I faint. Thanks. https://t.co/jnGgyhlV5h
@Jeffrey_Roe Wow! That's beautiful!
@minniemelange My friend is happy to help! https://t.co/CSFdtbxZjR
@minniemelange I asked *my* pal (who spent the day organising a science march) and he said to tell your pal 'not at all'.
@minniemelange This is AMAZING! <3

Help fund an important new anthology by @UnaMullally, capturing the Repeal The 8th movement. https://t.co/kMlMcDX1sE
@sophiec_expo I've just been reading about that. I hadn't realised. It goes against everything I believe in as a scientist.
@ErisLovesMovies I'll do a few episodes of recon and let you know https://t.co/0kUXevQ9oA
@ErisLovesMovies Same. I watched episode one and it was wonderful. I forgot how funny and beautifully made that show was.
@ErisLovesMovies This reminded me that He-Man and She-Ra have been added to Netflix and I'm going to watch every one of them.
@ianxcarlos No way. At worst, you're Percy.
@teabutton It's like what we did with Think:Tank, but the exact opposite. @jonathan_mccrea
I'm literally about to cry. But like, rage-cry. https://t.co/0eTojjgaRd

@sgmaher @claireoconnell @SciGalleryDub @tcddublin Thanks for taking part! Great to meet you and find out about your work.
@ccourtne I saw. This is obviously what I want my life to look like.
@illucifer I'm such a fan since the the reboot. I think Pratchett wrote her as a complex and believable hero.
I could listen to @hardwick and @TraceyUllmanTV all bloody day. Catching up on @nerdist podcasts and this is a gem: https://t.co/NloySYsfsU
@iamscicomm Completely agree with you on this. Mutual respect and understanding needed for art-science collaborations to be successful.
@andrewgurza Why we need disabled, queer male porn performers - it was great.
@andrewgurza Just read one of your articles in @HuffingtonPost and it was awesome.
@ruxtab Oh god. He's younger than me. https://t.co/RFSPi4Y69k

@ErisLovesMovies "Russia... and China... and... everybody". How does this happen? How does someone this stupid become president?!

@illucifer This is great!
@ItsSarahGarvey I think it came from heaven, originally. But I will also find out which shop it was bought in.
Hi guys. I found the world's best mug and this is it. Because Daniel O'Donnell. https://t.co/ozWAi5n6IZ
@kevin_maxwell Excellent article. Worked on this doc with @Maurice_J_K about racism experienced by LGBT travellers https://t.co/KDSQZsakAp

@choiceIrregular @Maurice_J_K This is amazing!
@choiceIrregular This is perfect.

@minniemelange Thank you ❤
@EdwardTHardy What a non-argument. Just because it took a few days to surface, doesn't mean homophobic jokes don't hurt.
@choiceIrregular That's amazing.
@katebevan Very true. It makes me feel sane when people criticise these things. Thank you.
@katebevan It happens in science a lot too. Representation is so important, and sadly those who are already well-represented don't see that.
@katebevan Why didn't they use a pic of the potential (diverse) audience, and make it about them? This is a problem in so many professions.
@minniemelange I definitely do! Thanks Sinéad 😉
This is really interesting. Growing up in Donegal, everyone called it Boxing Day. https://t.co/pkX1GZgdB1
@colmtobin Agreed. His charisma really shines in that clip. Bloody heartbreaking.
@colmtobin Awh, this is lovely.
@ErisLovesMovies @miabattista1 His reaction was very sweet. Plus the students were lovely. I want to go to there.
@miabattista1 @ErisLovesMovies That made me emotional. And I have two yule logs to make! How will I do this now?!
@mairead_hurley Brilliant! I'm a total beginner, but this is well worth a try - https://t.co/wxl6H5wozm
@Paraphyso Deal! It will be that, or one of my crying if I can't get it to work.
@Paraphyso I'm planning to start with Atari and work my way to SNES 💁🏼‍♂️
@Rob0Sullivan I am proof that you need neither time nor brains to do this. I'd definitely recommend getting one and playing around with it.
